languages.text: "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан, но кому-то из нас надо оставаться трезвым". {n}Дознаватель смотрит на вас с легкой укоризной.{/n}
"Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, Лорд-капитан, но кому-то из нас надо оставаться трезвым". {n}Дознаватель смотрит на вас с легкой укоризной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The interrogator looks at you a little reproachfully.{/n}
"Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The interrogator looks at you a little reproachfully.{/n}
"Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}
"Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}
"Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}
"Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}

languages.text: “谢谢你，舰长大人，但我们之中必须有人保持清醒。”{n}海因里希用略带责备的目光看了你一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “谢谢你，舰长大人，但我们之中必须有人保持清醒。”{n}海因里希用略带责备的目光看了你一眼。{/n}

languages.text: 「ありがとう、ロード・キャプテン。でも、俺たちの中で1人はしらふで残っている奴が必要だな」{n}インテロゲイターは、どこかたしなめるような視線をあなたに向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとう、ロード・キャプテン。でも、俺たちの中で1人はしらふで残っている奴が必要だな」{n}インテロゲイターは、どこかたしなめるような視線をあなたに向けた。{/n}

languages.text: «Gracias, Lord Capitán, pero al menos uno de nosotros ha de permanecer sobrio». {n}El interrogador te mira con expresión de ligero reproche.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, Lord Capitán, pero al menos uno de nosotros ha de permanecer sobrio». {n}El interrogador te mira con expresión de ligero reproche.{/n}

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan ama birimizin ayık kalması gerek." {n}Engizisyoncu sana hafif sitemkâr bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan ama birimizin ayık kalması gerek." {n}Engizisyoncu sana hafif sitemkâr bir bakış atıyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais il faut que l'un d'entre nous reste sobre. » {n}L'interrogateur vous lance un regard légèrement réprobateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais il faut que l'un d'entre nous reste sobre. » {n}L'interrogateur vous lance un regard légèrement réprobateur.{/n}

languages.text: "Danke, Lord Captain, aber einer von uns muss nüchtern bleiben." {n}Der Interrogator lächelt dich etwas vorwurfsvoll an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Lord Captain, but we need one of us to remain sober." {n}The Interrogator gives you a mildly reproachful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Lord Captain, aber einer von uns muss nüchtern bleiben." {n}Der Interrogator lächelt dich etwas vorwurfsvoll an.{/n}
